node.html:
• Developed the core product by building, deploying and testing scalable microservices on AWS Lambda, built on the Serverless Framework
  • Worked with various AWS services for the first time such as Lambda, DynamoDB, API Gateway, S3, EC2, CloudFormation, CloudWatch, AppSync, IAM, SNS and Route53
  • Worked in an agile development model with weekly sprints of rapid prototyping and testing of services
  • Worked with React front-end of the product, refactored and debugged page contexts to reduce overall component rendering time by atmost 36%
  • Responsible for API integration post deployment on AWS with the front-end

• Worked in weekly sprints with a team focused on building developer tooling, under the mentorship of members at MLH and Facebook Engineering.
  • Accepted as one of the 150 Fellows out of 43,000 applicants to the prestigious Fellowship Program.

• Our Idea "Hola - An app to help Explorerâ€™s Explore" has been selected into the project track of Cisco Thingqba- tor Programme conducted by Cisco, and is currently in the rapid prototyping phase
  • Architected and implemented the entire backend architecture for the app on AWS
  • I'm currently working on the react native app and integrating a couple of backend microservices with the frontend by leveraging AWS AppSync and GraphQL
